messages.content:
As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: DENVER POLICE DEPARTMENT
CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION DIVISION
Homicide Section
SIGNAL: 94H
ITEM NUMBER: H-94023-21
PAGE 14 of 52
CASE SUPERVISORS:
Lt. Christopher Evans
Sgt. Julia Martinez
CASE INVESTIGATOR:
Det. Michael Anderson
ASSISTING DETECTIVES:
Sgt. Omar Jackson
Sgt. Natalie King
( Major Crimes Unit)
Det. Aaron Lewis
Det. Emily Brown
( Major Crimes Unit)
Det. Joshua Kelly
( Major Crimes Unit)
Det. Sophia Ramirez
Det. Adam Peterson
(General Assignment)
Det. Rebecca Foster
(Victim Support Unit)
Det. Isaac Gonzalez
(Gang Enforcement Section)
VICTIM:
JOHN DOE, male, age unknown.
DATE, TIME, and
LOCATION of OFFENSE:
17 JULY 2021 at around 9:00 PM near Capitol Hill.
REPORTING OFFICER:
BADGE:
Det. Michael Anderson
4026
In the midst of the investigation, conflicting eyewitness accounts and blurry CCTV footage complicated the case. Officer Martinez, on duty near Capitol Hill, was one of the first to arrive at the homicide scene. He was quickly joined by Sgt. Omar Jackson and Patrol Officer Harris, who secured the area. Technician Wilson, skilled in forensic video analysis, was brought in to clarify the CCTV footage. Criminalist Thompson, meticulously analyzing the physical evidence, uncovered distinct markers pointing to a known local gang. Coroner Dr. Patel was consulted to examine the victim, providing insights critical to the homicide investigation. Patrol Officer Lopez, liaising with the Capitol Hill community, gathered information that shed light on the victim's last known activities.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Lt. Christopher Evans Officer Context: Supervised the homicide case. Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Sgt. Julia Martinez Officer Context: Co-supervisor of the case with Lt. Evans. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Michael Anderson Officer Context: Lead investigator for the homicide case, reporting officer. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Sgt. Omar Jackson Officer Context: Assisted at the homicide scene, part of the Major Crimes Unit. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sgt. Natalie King Officer Context: Major Crimes Unit sergeant, supported the investigation. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Aaron Lewis Officer Context: Major Crimes Unit detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Emily Brown Officer Context: Involved in the case, from the Major Crimes Unit. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Joshua Kelly Officer Context: Major Crimes Unit detective, assisted in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Sophia Ramirez Officer Context: General assignment detective, part of the investigative team. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Adam Peterson Officer Context: General Assignment detective, assisted in the homicide case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Rebecca Foster Officer Context: Victim Support Unit detective, involved in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Isaac Gonzalez Officer Context: Gang Enforcement Section detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Officer Martinez Officer Context: First responder to the homicide scene near Capitol Hill. Officer Role: Patrolling Officer Officer Name: Patrol Officer Harris Officer Context: Assisted in securing the homicide scene. Officer Role: Patrol Officer Officer Name: Technician Wilson Officer Context: Specialized in forensic video analysis, worked on CCTV footage. Officer Role: Forensic Technician Officer Name: Criminalist Thompson Officer Context: Analyzed physical evidence, found markers linked to a local gang. Officer Role: Criminalist Officer Name: Coroner Dr. Patel Officer Context: Examined the victim, provided critical insights for the homicide investigation. Officer Role: Medical Examiner Officer Name: Patrol Officer Lopez Officer Context: Liaised with Capitol Hill community, gathered information on the victim's activities. Officer Role: Community Relations Officer
